title: Radisson Blu Chattogram
address: SS Khaled Road, Lalkhan Bazar, Chattogram - 4000, Bangladesh
description:
Radisson Blu Chattogram is one of the most luxurious and well-known hotels in Chattogram, offering a perfect blend of modern amenities and world-class hospitality. Located in the heart of the city, the hotel provides easy access to major business hubs, shopping centers, and tourist attractions. It is a preferred choice for business travelers, tourists, and those seeking a luxurious stay in Chattogram.

The hotel features elegantly designed rooms and suites, each equipped with state-of-the-art facilities to ensure maximum comfort. Guests can enjoy a variety of dining options, including international cuisines at the on-site restaurants. The hotel also boasts a fitness center, swimming pool, spa, and business facilities, making it an ideal destination for both leisure and business travelers.

Radisson Blu Chattogram is renowned for its exceptional service and attention to detail. Whether you're attending a business meeting, hosting an event, or simply relaxing, the hotel ensures a memorable and comfortable experience for every guest.
